statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 101 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND weight < 60;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND dob < '1990-01-01';

DELETE FROM health_risk WHERE risk_category = 'High' AND risk_level >= 3
DELETE FROM HealthRisks WHERE patient_id = 101 AND risk_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM PatientHistory WHERE patient_id = 202 AND event_date <= '2022-01-01';
